üß© *Top 5 Action Items*  
1. Check out LinkedIn profiles of new connections and start a conversation ‚Äì _Networking is crucial for individual growth and gaining industry insights._
2. Complete a 5-minute survey requested by Google Ads ‚Äì _A $10 USD gift code will be provided as a token of appreciation._
3. Respond to the task list from ClickUp related to different marketing campaigns and operations for clients 'Red Rooster Coffee' and 'Puppys R Us' ‚Äì _Several actions are required including revised creative ad variations, finalizing approvals, and managing overdue tasks._
4. Schedule a call with Akshat at heyrecruiting.com ‚Äì _To discuss potential hiring of an executive assistant._
5. Review the Executive Assistant's resume and intro video pitched by Elaine Delaney from Hey Recruiting ‚Äì _The assistant is skilled in managing calendars, communications, and team logistics._
